entry.title: 口语
entry.content:
Topic

存在的问题

1.发音有口音
2.Part1 部分发音不清晰，语速过快
3.用词简单缺少短语
4.需要加例子，for instance，for examoplke,

词汇积累

==manufacturer== 生产厂商
==intricate== 替换complex 复杂的
==self-confident== 自信的
==have a good mood==

Color

相关词汇：
==dark shade== 深色区域 <-> ==light shade== 浅色区域
==gloomy== 阴暗的， gloomy mood
==desperate== 绝望
==funeral==葬礼
sorrow
==dark colors== 深色
==vibrant colors== 鲜艳的颜色

  • Different people like different colores?
    分男女：different from different people
    men：black, gray sports clothes，coats
    women: yellow, green dress,T-shirts,jeans
    ==boost their self-confidence and esteem==
  • What color would you like to buy?
    red fararri, obvious(/D/发音) – convinient for my freiends to find me through a lot of people
    ==eye-catching==
    ==satisfy my vanity== 满足我的虚荣心

Cake

相关词汇：
brownie
sponge cakes
tiramisu
recipe
==make a bit of a mess==弄的有点乱
==give it a go==尝试做某事
I think we should give it a go.

  • Do you like to eat cakes or other sweet food?
  • Chinese cakes?
    ==mooncale== Mid Autumn Day
    ==rice cake== Chinese New Year has a positive meaning such as making progress in career
    ==red bean cake== as snacks in daily life
  • eat cakes after a meal?
    no, many calories and want to keep fit,
    not a good eating habit, may lead some healthy problems such as diabetes, high blood pressure,etc.

Map

相关词汇：
telephone is ==run out of bettery== 手机没电
battery is dead
形容电子地图：
efficiently
essential
==time-saveing==
==quite handy==便携
==find destination smoothly== 顺利找到目的地
P2
easily find the route
withour find the wrong tracj
==accurate route== on the way
==with the assistence of map==
==highways== 高速公路
==landmark== 地标
== on the right track== 在正确的路上
reduce our anxiety
P3

  • What do people usually do when they get lost?
    分年龄 different ==reactions==
    children childish naive inexperienced – cried ==overwhelmed== 不知所措的
    adult smartphone –find the right track
  • What are the differences between paper and digital maps
  1. 更新digital update automatically
    paper buy a new one
  2. function digital: ==interactive== functions
    ==zoom in== details 放大细节
    ==voice navigation== conveniently
    paper: dangerous highways
  3. 路线选择
    digital automatically plan the best route
    paper find a way by your own

  • What do pepole often do use a map?
    navigate
    geography classes
    road trip

  • Why do most people prefer to use a paper map?
    ==backup== plan remote areas
    ==lifesaver== 救急
    continent 大洲 ==get a better understand of==
    老人
    ==portable== 便携

  • How does learning to read a map help you leran more about your country?

    1. major cities landmarks ==tourists attractions==

    2. ==terrian==地形 grass ==plains==平原 ==plateus== 高原
      ==mountains== ==basin==盆地

    3. resources coal forests
      ==indespensible== 不可或缺的

Musical Party

相关词汇：
==lyrics== feel less stress
==rock music== excited
==troublesome==
==time-consuming and energy consuming
Many people lead a ==hectic== life now,so they rarely have ==abundant== time to prepare for a fun party
==On top of that== 除此之外
==address the situation== 解决问题
==ambiance== 环境

Home & Accomodation

相关词汇：
==roomy== ==spacious== 广阔的
==living codition== ==living standard== 生活品质

Fishing

相关词汇：
==aquarium== 水族馆
==sharks, manta ray魔鬼鱼, clownfish小丑鱼, corps(鲤鱼)==
finding nemo海底总动员
meg 巨齿鲨
biodiversity 生物多样性
==has nothing to do with== geography
==can not qualified for== 具备—的资质

Advertisement commercial

相关词汇：
== public service advertising== 公益广告

  1. educational
  2. ==thought provoking==发人深省的
    ==life leesons==人生道理
    ==hilarious==滑稽的，搞笑的
    ==innovative== 革新的，新颖的，富有革新精神的

制服

相关词汇：
==create a professional image==
==sense of belongings== 归属感
==foster a team spirit and a sense of belonging==
==establish trust and credibility with customers==与客户简历信任和信誉
be designed with safety and fuctionality in mind
==simplify the morning routine==
==rudece stress associated with choosing ==appropriate clothing==
==feel freezed==感到寒冷
==harsh winter==寒冷的冬天
==scorching summer== 炎热的夏天
穿制服的好处

  1. ==sense of equility==
    ==regardless if their socioeconomic==
    ==backgrounds==社会经济背景如何
    ==distinguish them from outsiders==与外来人员区分开
  2. minimizes the distractions related to fashion, focus more on studies
  3. save parent’s money by spending less on student’s clothing
    穿制服的缺点
  4. limit student’s expression of individuality and creativity
  5. additional financial burden of families
    need to bereplaced or supplemented as children grow
  6. may not comfortable or ==pracitcal== 实用的
    -让员工自己设计服装
    feel reluctant to do
    win-win choice
    总结词汇：
    in conclusion, all in all, in a word
    hospitality
    形容人virtue
    ==considerate== 体贴的
    ==kind-hearted== 热心的
    ==hospitable==好客的
    ==extroverted==外向的
    ==introverted==内向的
    ==be conditioned to== 习惯于
    in advance
    create friendly atmosphere
    ==play smoothing music==舒服的音乐
    cook a ==rich== dinner
    ==home-made cookies==
    == memorable, unforgettable== 难忘的
    ==rewarding==有意义的
    hospitablity impressed me very much

people who like to talk

相关词汇：
outgoing, enthusiastic, knowlegeable, friend nature
==eloquent==口齿伶俐的 ==articulate== 明确表达/口齿清楚的
==strike a balance==达成平衡
==hunble==谦虚的
==overwhelming==难以抗拒的
==verbal communication==
==talkative demeanor==能说会道的行为
==extroverted==外向的
rewrite改写
==hectic== =busy 忙碌的
trophy trophies奖杯
precious memory
==keep a low profile/key== 保持低调
==tranquil==安静的
==serene== 平静的
==overcrowded spots==过于拥挤的地方
==time-consuming==浪费时间
==mobile phone wallpaper== 手机壁纸
==luxious==奢侈的
==high-resolution pictures== 高清照片
==the read booklet== 小红书

擅长做饭的人

相关词汇：
Chinese ==cuisine== western food
==gourmet== food 美味的食物
==take-out==外卖（不可数）
==stove==炉子
==electronic recipe==电子菜谱
==rice cooker== 电饭堡
oven dish-washer
菜名
Dongpo pork
west lake vinegar fish
==stewed chicken with mushrooms== 小鸡炖蘑菇
==surveillance camera== 监控摄像头

第一天上学

high middke school
best school in our city

城市里的公园或花园

How often you go there
Where it is
Who you often go there with
What it is like
And explain why you like to visit it

every week go to west lake park
located in Hangzhou
famous for the love stories and beautiful seneries
with friends
communicate with each other
on the broken bridge ==overlook== the lake and see the fish playing in it
good place for all ages of people
why:

  1. take beautiful pictures with freinds
    leave a good memory in my mind, unforgettable
    deapen freindship
  2. feel unwind and recharge my battery
    hectic with my study and write a paper== without a clue==
  3. many authentic restaurants near the park
    ==goumet== food called west lake vinegar fish and Dongpo pork
    share food with freinds
    promote our sense of happiness

能说会道的人

Who this person is
How you knew this person
What he/she usually talks about
And explain how you felt about him/her
Tom
met in computer classes in university
met difficulties
ask for his help and knew him ==after then on==
always talk with others about computer language grammer and systems
left me a deep impression

  1. ==ertroverted== outgoing
    after class, talk some knowledge with classmates and teachers
  2. enthusiastic eloquent ==articulate==
    taught how to finish project clearly
  3. kindhearted responsible
    others were reluctant to make presentation
    He== took the initiative to assume the responsibility of== speaking on stage

给力队友

Who this person is
When you worked togetherWhat he/she did in the team

And explain why you think he/she was a great teamplayer

Tom
my university classmates
in our computer science class
teamwork together
palyed a role of leader and help others when they met arduous tasks

  1. enthusiasctic and knowlegeable
    troublesome for me to finish my part
    told me how to do it
    Everytime I met difficulties, ask for his help
    patient and taught me a lot of computer language grammer
  2. outgoing, ertoververted and be able to organize us
    sent our message by wechat and organized an online meeting
    made presentation and allocated task to eavery classmate in our team
    ==get the best out of everyone
  3. full of responsibility
    others were reluctant to make presentation
    leader
    He ==took the initiative to assume the responsibility of== speaking on stage

让你开心的照片

Describe a photo that makes you feel happy

You should say:
When and where you took the photoWhat the photo is like
How often you look at the photoAnd explain why it makes you feel happy

took a photo on the airplane when I travelled to Hangzhou

took a night view of Hangzhou clearly from a overlook sight

many different colors lights and saw the west lake

sent this picture to our university

got fisrt prize in phtography competition

put it on my desk Everytime I work and feel pressure, look it

  1. feel happy not only because it brought a medal but also for the beautiful seaneries

  2. pround of my skills of photograpghy

    adjust many parameters to take this picture

    clearly see the outline of west lake and the different colors of street lights

  3. relax myself when I suffered from papers

    can make me recall the memory about experience of going to the west lake

    ate the authentic street food around the west lake

  4. show the development of Hangzhou economics

    it is said that city with more lights at night shows the higher economic standard it has

喜欢烹饪的人

Describe a person who enjoys cooking for othersYou should say:
Who this person is
What he/she likes to cook
Who he/she cooks forAnd explain why he/she enjoys cooking

Tom
==Chinese cuisine and western food==
make hotpot and soup for us
barbecue in his big garden

  1. feel happy and deepen freindship
    convienient to hold barbecuee party
    communicate with his freinds

  2. do not like eating outside
    unhealthy , not fresh
    choose to cook at home

  3. release pressure
    feel stressed out
    cook delicious food
    in this procedure, help him recharge his battery and feel unwind

第一天上学

克服困难最终成功

难忘的一餐

在某个城市短暂停留

​

听力

go beside 在—旁边
against the sidewall 靠着侧墙
currency 货币
==recreational== 娱乐的，消遣的
practical 实际的，实事
online 网上的，不需要连字符
services cn.
relaxed 替换 flexible
at the end of corridor 在走廊尽头

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
